short_summary: FOR the development and advancement of 9 priority technologies
description: Development, advance and fill the gap of 9 priority technologies for the Canadian Space Agency (CSA)
full_summary:
### Development of Enabling Space Technologies Tender Announcement

**Reference:** WS3927164898-Doc3927288277

**Tender Status:** **Closed**

**Tender Description:**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking bids on behalf of the Canadian Space Agency ( CSA) to develop and advance nine (9) Priority Technologies that align with the CSA's priorities and mission roadmaps.

The aim of this tender is to select a contractor to develop and advance these Priority Technologies, which have been established by the CSA as critical technologies required to meet the objectives set forth by the Canadian Space Strategy. 

**Key Deliverables:**

-  Develop and advance nine (9) Priority Technologies

**Contract Duration:**

- The contract duration will vary between 15 to 25 months, depending on the targeted maturity level (NML) for each technology.

**Submission Requirements:**

- Supporting documentation and bid submission are required by **May 24, 2023, at 14:00 EDT**.
- All bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Contact Information:**

- Cimpan, Cristina (SPAC/PSPC)
- cristina.cimpan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- (No phone or fax number provided)

**Additional Information:**
 
This tender is a competitive, open bidding process governed by the selection criteria of **Highest Technical Merit within a Stipulated Maximum Budget**.

Please follow the tender notice on SAP Ariba(http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15775014), noting that an **amendment to the closing time has been made**, requiring all required supporting documentation and bid submission to be submitted by **May 24, 2023, at 14:00 EDT**.

The Statement of Work is provided in Annex A - Statement of Work, which details the full scope of work that the Contractor must provide and deliver.
